short_description: 【Hinged knee brace】The knee brace with hinge protects the knees and adopts a durable hinge design, which is wear-resistant and not easy to damage. It can help users stabilize the knees while preventing harmful(❗❗❗Please adjust the buckles on both sides of the knees at the same time when using)

【Provides Knee Support】 This knee brace for knee surgery recovery offers two modes: fixed-angle and restricted-range modes, suitable for both active and immobile leg situations, respectively. It relieves knee pain and improves mobility. The brace features a telescopic bracket and elastic support design, providing more stable support and fixation for the leg, creating an ideal recovery environment for the patient.

【Adjustable patella knee brace】 This adjustable knee immobilizer is padded with breathable and non-slip fabric, which will not make you feel stuffy even if you wear it for a long time. The knee braces uses a pull-type fixed adjustment strap to adjust the size of the knee pad, which is suitable for people of all body shapes. The locking knee brace is fixed with Velcro, which is not only easy to put on and take off, but also makes it fit the legs better and not easy to slip off.

【High-quality alloy material】The knee brace for men&women uses alloy material for the supporting part, which can provide sufficient support and stability and is more durable; knee brace with side stabilizers weighs only 0.9kg, which is moderate in weight. It can provide sufficient support without affecting normal movement, will not have adverse effects on leg recovery, and will not affect the user's daily movement.

【Well knee brace is suitable for a wide range of people】 This protective gear designed for knee pain can provide auxiliary recovery for people with knee fractures, dislocations, meniscus injuries and various knee pains, and can minimize the risk of re-injury. This knee support for knee pain regardless of the user's fatness, thinness, height or shortness, it can be adjusted and worn. Whether it is a slight knee discomfort or a serious knee problem, this product can provide you with good support and fixation through adjustment.

name: Ovation Medical Game Changer Unloader Knee Brace - Lightweight, Low Profile OA Knee Brace for Arthritis Pain and Support - Premium Knee Support for Medial and Lateral Knee Pain (Left)
short_description: GAME CHANGER UNLOADER KNEE BRACE: Experience a convenient, effective, and economical solution to OA Knee pain with Ovation’s innovative Game Changer hinged knee brace. The Game Changer combines unrivaled comfort, flexibility, and fit to provide a superior, targeted reduction of knee pain.

PRECISION COMFORT: Effective single upright design offloads both medial and lateral knee pain and is significantly more comfortable for all day wear than its double upright counterparts. It does not rub the insides of the knee and enables the user to wear two braces at the same time, allowing for a more active, pain-free lifestyle.

COMPREHENSIVE SUPPORT: The Game Changer OA knee brace fits virtually all users and is expertly designed to promote broad relief and joint stability for users who suffer from Osteoarthritis, Degenerative Meniscal Tears, or other conditions that may benefit from uni-compartmental offloading of the knee. It features easy push-button release buckles for easy application, allowing users with hand mobility limitations to use comfortably.

HOW TO USE: Begin by releasing all buckles and positioning the brace while seated. Align the central push button just above the patella and securely reattach the buckles. Adjust the straps until you’ve achieved a comfortable but secure fit. If further adjustment is needed, refer to the strap adjustment video. For medial off-loading, turn the adjustment key counterclockwise; for lateral off-loading, turn clockwise.

A STANDING OVATION: Ovation Medical is a family-run, US-based business, passionate about providing exceptional quality, service, and selection to its customers. Ovation guarantees all products are defect free.
